desc: Dolphin is a GameCube / Wii emulator, allowing you to play games for these two platforms on PC with improvements.

The continuing development of the legendary VBA gameboy advance emulator.

A Game Boy emulator, disassembler and debugger, written in Rust
higan is a multi-system emulator focused on accuracy, preservation, and configurability.

A gameboy emulator that only plays Pokemon Blue, in ~50 lines of c++.
A maintained fork of ZSNES, a Super Nintendo emulator. The original project needs patches to build and is not maintained anymore: https://sourceforge.net/projects/zsnes/
